structured.description: A `PageInfo` class that encapsulates information about a page of data retrieved from a database or other source. The class has fields for the current page number, page size, total pages, and total elements, and provides a constructor for creating instances. Additionally, there is a static method `of` that creates a new `PageInfo` instance based on a provided `Pageable` object and `Page` instance.

items.description: Is an utility class for managing page information, such as current page, limit per page, total pages and total elements. The class provides a constructor to create instances of the class with values from a given pageable and page objects.
items.name: PageInfo

items.description: Returns a `PageInfo` object containing information about the number of pages, size of each page, total number of pages and elements, based on a provided `Pageable` object and a passed `Page` object.

params.name: pageable
params.description: page number and size of the page being queried, which are used to calculate the total pages and elements in the PageInfo object returned by the function.

params.name: page
params.description: current page being processed, providing the total number of elements on that page.

items.name: of

structured.description: A `PageInfo` class that represents metadata about a page of results from a data source. The class has fields for the current page number, page size, total pages, and total elements. A static method `of` creates an instance of `PageInfo` from a `Pageable` object and a `Page` object.

items.description: Is a data structure used to represent information about a page of elements. It consists of four fields: currentPage, pageLimit, totalPages, and totalElements. The class provides a convenient way to create instances of PageInfo from a Pageable object and its corresponding Page.
items.name: PageInfo

items.description: Returns a `PageInfo` object containing information about the number of pages, page size, total pages, and total elements for a given `Pageable` and `Page`.

params.name: pageable
params.description: pageable object that contains information about the current page being processed, including the number of elements per page and the total number of pages in the dataset.

params.name: page
params.description: current page being processed, providing the total number of elements on that page.

returns.description: a `PageInfo` object containing page number, size, total pages, and total elements.

items.name: of
